title:
Creating Publishing Accounts for University Professors on Global
  Scientific Websites (ORCID, Research Gate, Google Scholar)
abstract:
Perhaps among the most prominent sites on which we always encourage
professors to create accounts are (ORCID), (Reserach Gate), and (Google
Scholar), and how to publish and promote their research through social media or
through educational platforms, conferences, and scientific workshops Then we
try to explain, in the course of the research, in a smooth manner, the ways to
activate accounts on these platforms, supported by pictures and a comprehensive
step-by-step explanation, as a gesture to encourage the spread of the culture
of electronic publishing in light of the escalation of the digital and
computing revolution and the desire to catch up with its accelerating pace
